name: Superconductor Ludum Dare Edition
description:
Try to use the direct link if the game freezes or experiences problems with mobile devices: https://v6p9d9t4.ssl.hwcdn.net/html/2809727/index.html

Superconductor is a light-conducting puzzle game where you need to always contain the light in a loop.

The power station is down and this is the only beam of energy we have. Can you convey it to the rocket launcher?

Push the transmitters to change the light path. But be careful! If the energy beam flees from a loop, you will lose them forever.

Update 10/6: Fixed a crucial bug that the last level cannot finish properly.
